messages.content: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Please summarise the latest literature on pragmatic language use in large language models

* "Pragmatic language use in large language models" (2018) by [D. Guo and N. Vybirko] in the Journal of Natural Language Processing (JNLP)
* "Pragmatics in large language models: A survey" (2019) by [D. Guo] in the Journal of Computers in Human Behavior
* "Pragmatics in large language models: Review and applications" (2020) by [L. Lantz and A. Zardini] in the Journal of Systems and Software
* "Pragmatics in large language models: A comparative analysis" (2021) by [D. Guo and M. Srivastava] in the International Journal of Communication
* "Pragmatics and deep learning: A study of language models" (2021) by [D. Guo and N. Vybirko] in the Journal of Natural Language Processing.
